    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_100041</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Electric cell</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrische Zelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cellule électrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pilha elétrica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cellula elettrica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρικό κύτταρο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Célula eléctrica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an electric cell made up of silver and zinc discs separated by  cardboard discs soaked in salt solution.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Alessandro Volta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cardboard disc</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">salt solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">silver disc</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">volt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">zinc disc</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine elektrische Zelle, die
von den Silber- und Zinkplatten gebildet wird, die durch die 
Pappplatten getrennt werden, die in der Salzlösung getränkt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une cellule électrique
composée des disques d'argent et de zinc séparés par des disques de
carton imbibés dans la solution de sel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma pilha elétrica 
composta dos discos da prata e do zinco separados pelos discos do 
cartão embebidos na solução de sal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una cellula elettrica
composta dei dischi dello zinco e dell'argento separati dai dischi del
cartone impregnati nella soluzione salina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ηλεκτρικό κύτταρο 
φιαγμένο επάνω από δίσκους ασημιών και ψευδάργυρου που 
χωρίζονται από τους δίσκους χαρτονιού που ενυδατώνονται στην 
αλατισμένη λύση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una célula eléctrica 
compuesta de los discos de la plata y del cinc separados por los 
discos de la cartulina remojados en la solución de sal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alessandro Volta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pappplatte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Zelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Salzlösung</string>
          </keyword>
